column4: when I plug in usb devices, they aren't always detected automatically.... Only when I reboot. Is there any command I can use to mount a device automatically?
sure - sudo mount /dev/sdXN, where X is a letter and N is a number corresponding to the device and partition thereon
is there anyway without knowing X or N? The system used to do this automatically until I upgraded to latest release of ubuntu
it works automatically when I reboot
